{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-N300.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N300 3-in-1 Router for Small Business and Home Network |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N300-B1/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-N300_B1 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RT-N300 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = B1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = MSQ-RT1P00 |icid = 3568A-RTN300B1 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628N; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = (32 R2) |cpu1spd = 575 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9425G6KH-5; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = |manuf = T&W |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan ? |availability = only for US/CA |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/01/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP-MT0P-C00H", "REV1.0", "RoHS" and "1606" (02/2016) is silkscreened :on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046796 FCC photos] (T&W) {{see also|ASUS RT-N12+ B1|ASUS RT-N12+ V3|ASUS RT-N300}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT1P00 MSQ-RT1P00] (2016-07-01) {{•}} [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046803 FCC Users Manual] *Brand: ASUS *Test Model: '''RT-N300 B1''' *Series Model: [[ASUS RT-N12+ B1|RT-N12+ B1]], [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3|RT-N12+ V3]] *Sample Status: Engineering sample *Product: Wireless-N Router ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:63015:1298#1298 ''ASUS RT-N300'' on '''iXBT''' forums] ==Notes== 
export RT-N300_BASE := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7628=y SSH=y 
EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y AUTODICT=y SHP=y RTN11PB1=y ODMPID=y 
NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y REPEATER=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
BTN_WPS_RST=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=n WAN_AT_P4=y LANWAN_LED=y BLINK_LED=y 
SINGLE_2G=y VPNC=y YANDEXDNS=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y LAN50=y 
BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y NEWSSID_REV2=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
	EDCCA_NEW=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI \
	DRAM=32M 

export RT-N11P_B1 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N11P_B1 += BUILD_NAME="RT-N11P_B1" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN11PB1=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"

export RT-N10P_V3 := $(RT-N300_BASE)
export RT-N10P_V3 += BASE_MODEL="RT-N11P_B1" BUILD_NAME="RT-N10P_V3" 
       EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7628_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_32M=y 
       UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RTN10PV3=y SHRINK_PAGECACHE=y"
==See also== * [[ASUS RT-N11P]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN11P/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N11P B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N11P-B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12+]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN12Plus/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12+ B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-V3/ Product page] * * [[ASUS RT-N12E B1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN12E_B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N12E C1]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12E-C1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N300]] - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-N300/ Product page] (US) * ASUS RT-N300 B1 - N300 (300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N300-B1/ Product page] * [[ASUS RT-N600]] - N600 (300+300Mbps) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RTN600/ Product Page] (US) [[Category:English Documentation]]
